String.Source: She...what? But you don't even know her! The two of you rarely even speak!
String.Dest: She...what? But you don't even know her! The two of you rarely even speak!

String.Source: Peragorn, can I ask you a question? In your time here at the Bunkhouse, has Haelga ever made any...romantic advances?
String.Dest: Peragorn, can I ask you a question? In your time here at the Bunkhouse, has Haelga ever made any...romantic advances?

String.Source: I see. So, just the bottom half then?
String.Dest: 明白了。也就是说只有下半部分？

String.Source: Is it true that the Elves in Valenwood enjoy being...one with nature? I wonder if I'll even need clothes.
String.Dest: 威木省的精灵还真的喜欢……天人合一？我都不知道要不要穿衣服了。

String.Source: I've retrieved the Statue of Dibella.
String.Dest: 我拿回了那尊迪贝拉雕像。

String.Source: Congratulations. It seems you have succeeded in performing this mundane and extremely tedious task.
String.Dest: 恭喜恭喜。看这情况，你似乎已经完成了这件枯燥乏味的工作。

String.Source: I've retrieved the Statue of Dibella.
String.Dest: 我拿回了那尊迪贝拉雕像。

String.Source: I've retrieved the two Statues of Dibella.
String.Dest: 我拿回了那两尊迪贝拉雕像。

String.Source: Your persistence is remarkable. Not only have you successfully retrieved two statues of Dibella, but you have done so while maintaining your sanity.
String.Dest: 你的持久性令人惊讶，不仅仅是因为你取出了两个迪贝拉的雕像，还因为你仍然如此清醒。

String.Source: I've retrieved the Statue of Dibella.
String.Dest: 我拿回了那尊迪贝拉雕像。

String.Source: I've retrieved three Statues of Dibella.
String.Dest: 我取回了三个迪贝拉雕像。

String.Source: You've done it! Glorious! Now surely Haelga will allow me to consummate this marriage.
String.Dest: 你做到了！太帅了！现在哈尔嘉肯定会准许我让这场婚礼完美起来的。

String.Source: Fine. Whatever.
String.Dest: 好吧，爱咋地咋地。

String.Source: Don't be flippant, or I will have Haelga suffocate you with her bosom. Now go. Failure is not an option.
String.Dest: 别如此轻薄，不然让你死于哈尔嘉的胸器之下。现在该干什么干什么去。失败可是不被允许的。

String.Source: It cannot be done.
String.Dest: 这个没办法。

String.Source: Do not take such a negative attitude. Even the journey to High Hrothgar begins with a simple step. Now go. Achieve the unthinkable.
String.Dest: 不要这么悲观嘛，不积跬步，无以至千里。现在好了，去找寻奇迹吧。

String.Source: I can, my Jarl.
String.Dest: 我可以，我的男爵。

String.Source: Excellent. Go forth, gather the statues, and bathe yourself in glory!
String.Dest: 好极了。继续前进，收集雕像，接受荣耀的洗礼！

String.Source: Can you do it?
String.Dest: 你能做到吗？

String.Source: Not in the least. If Haelga's bosom is the last thing I ever see, then I consider myself a lucky Elf.
String.Dest: 完全不是。石榴裙下死做鬼也风流。

String.Source: By the Divines, Amicus, do I have to do everything for you? You're worse than Peragorn. Here.
String.Dest: 圣灵在上，艾美斯，你非得什么事儿都让我替你做吗？在这点上你可比不上佩勒根。给。

String.Source: No, no. You've proven more than adequate at that. No, to escape this place, you will have to overcome one of two challenges.
String.Dest: 不，不。你已经证明了自己的能力绰绰有余。不过，要离开这个地方，你还要赢得这两项挑战的其中一个。

String.Source: Behind the door on the right, you will find a twenty skeever-sized Centurions. Behind the door on the left, one Centurion-sized skeever.
String.Dest: 穿过右边的门，你会遇到二十个雪鼠体积的矮人百夫长。穿过左边的门，则有一头矮人百夫长大小的雪鼠。

String.Source: Make your choice, and you'll find your exit.
String.Dest: 做出选择，你就能离开这里了。

String.Source: You can leave whenever you wish. The sooner the better. I get performance anxiety when I know people are listening.
String.Dest: 你想什么时候走都行。但是越快越好。有观众的时候我总会怯场。

String.Source: You can take the door on the left, or the door on the right. Both present their own unique challenges.
String.Dest: 你可以开左边的门，也可以开右边的门。两边都有他们特有的挑战。

String.Source: Oh right. But where am I going to find a trout at this hour?
String.Dest: 好吧。不过在这个时间我该去哪儿找一条鳟鱼？

String.Source: Very well. What I ask is a feat never attempted in the history of mortals. I ask you to fetch not one, not two, but three statues of Dibella!
String.Dest: 很好。我的要求是一个人类史上前所未有的成就。我要你取的不是一个两个，而是整整三个迪贝拉的雕像！

String.Source: Bravo. But what I ask next, may wilt even the hardiest of minds.
String.Dest: 很棒。但我接下来的要求，会让最坚强人畏缩不前。

String.Source: Not all of you will survive this task, but those that will, shall carve their name into the sky for all eternity.
String.Dest: 并不是你们中的每一个人都能活下来，但是那些回来的人将会流芳百世。

String.Source: Actually Amicus, since I'm the Jarl, technically nothing I say can ever be ridiculed. Otherwise people lose their toes and other body parts.
String.Dest: 实际上艾美斯，由于我是领主，原则上我不能乱说话。否则的话，人民就会被斩断脚趾乃至身上的其他部位。

String.Source: Besides, I'm only playing the role you gave me. After all...
String.Dest: 此外，我正在扮演你给我的角色。毕竟……

String.Source: But now I will ask you to do something far more harrowing. Before, you may recall that I asked you to fetch one statue of Dibella.
String.Dest: 但现在我将让你做一些更苦恼的事情。你可能还记得，之前我有要你去取一尊迪贝拉的雕像。

String.Source: Somehow, you managed to survive. But now, I ask you to be twice the hero you were before. For I need two statues of Dibella, and I need them now.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，你活着回来了。不过现在，我要让你有更高的声望。我需要两个迪贝拉雕像，现在就要。

String.Source: Yes. In fact, precisely the one over there.
String.Dest: 没错。准确的来说，那边那个。

String.Source: I'm glad you asked. I need you to fetch an item of great importance.
String.Dest: 我很高兴你过问。我需要你去取一个很重要的物品。

String.Source: One that could very well save the entire kingdom, but more importantly, my marriage. Haelga is a very needy woman.
String.Dest: 一个能够守护整个王国的人，但是更重要的是我的婚姻。哈尔嘉是一个很穷的女人。

String.Source: I need you to retrieve for me, one statue of Dibella.
String.Dest: 我要你帮我找个东西，一个迪贝拉的塑像。

String.Source: What, did you think you could just clap your hands and wake up? Not in my domain.
String.Dest: 什么你以为你可以简单的合上双手然后醒过来？在我的领域里，不可能。

String.Source: Especially given my entire existence is dependent on you staying asleep.
String.Dest: 尤其在我完全依赖于你的沉睡才能存在的情况下。

String.Source: I do. But getting out won't be easy.
String.Dest: 没错，想出去可没那么容易。

String.Source: Not just any face, Amicus. The face of your Jarl. Nice hat, by the way.
String.Dest: 不是什么面子的问题，这关系到作为贵族的你的威信。顺便提一下，帽子不错。

String.Source: How should I know, Amicus, it's your dream.
String.Dest: 我为什么应该知道，阿米卡，那是你的梦。

String.Source: I was wondering if you knew the creator of this sculpture of Mara, and whether there was a...mortal inspiration for its contour.
String.Dest: 我想知道你是否了解谁才是这座玛拉雕像的制作者，以及在制作它的轮廓时是否有一些……参考凡人外貌的成分在里面。

String.Source: Jade, I was wondering if you could perhaps answer a question for me. A purely intellectual one of course.
String.Dest: Jade, I was wondering if you could perhaps answer a question for me. A purely intellectual one of course.

String.Source: Forget her. There aren't enough potions in Nirn to cure the diseases you'd get.
String.Dest: 忘了她吧。这里有足够的奈恩药水来治疗你的伤痛。

String.Source: Yes, I suppose you're right. It's just from a purely intellectual standpoint, there aren't too many places to learn Dibellan arts.
String.Dest: Yes, I suppose you're right. It's just from a purely intellectual standpoint, there aren't too many places to learn Dibellan arts.

String.Source: Forget her. There aren't enough potions in Nirn to cure the diseases you'd get.
String.Dest: 忘了她吧。这里有足够的奈恩药水来治疗你的伤痛。

String.Source: I mean, I don't even have to bed her. I'm fairly observant. The least she could do is let me watch.
String.Dest: I mean, I don't even have to bed her. I'm fairly observant. The least she could do is let me watch.

String.Source: I enjoy the classics.
String.Dest: 我喜欢经典的。

String.Source: You and me both. Too many people see books as practical tools to boost their acumen, but pass over the wealth of wisdom held within each story.
String.Dest: You and me both. Too many people see books as practical tools to boost their acumen, but pass over the wealth of wisdom held within each story.

String.Source: I enjoy the classics.
String.Dest: 我喜欢经典的。

String.Source: Others will read a story but miss the point entirely.
String.Dest: 其余的人读了故事，但却完全没抓到重点。

String.Source: I enjoy the classics.
String.Dest: 我喜欢经典的。

String.Source: Stories about Daedra, for instance, are not about Daedra. They are meant to show us the grotesqueness of man.
String.Dest: 就拿魔族的故事来说好了。它们的目的不是在说魔族怎样，而是告诉我们人有多荒诞。

String.Source: I tend to skip through books, to be honest.
String.Dest: 我实话，我比较倾向于略览书籍。

String.Source: I get it. You seek the knowledge, but not the wisdom. You boost your skills while failing to develop your character.
String.Dest: I get it. You seek the knowledge, but not the wisdom. You boost your skills while failing to develop your character.

String.Source: Haelga is built like most Nord women. It's not a bosom, it's a chest plate.
String.Dest: Haelga is built like most Nord women. It's not a bosom, it's a chest plate.

String.Source: So you've seen it? Or touched it? Why has everyone in this town done so but me?
String.Dest: So you've seen it? Or touched it? Why has everyone in this town done so but me?

String.Source: Haelga is rather beautiful. I can see why men chase her.
String.Dest: Haelga is rather beautiful. I can see why men chase her.

String.Source: But that's the problem. I didn't envision there would be any chasing at all. Not with her reputation, anyway.
String.Dest: But that's the problem. I didn't envision there would be any chasing at all. Not with her reputation, anyway.

String.Source: Her bosom is ample, but she also has a chin that's squarer than a table.
String.Dest: Her bosom is ample, but she also has a chin that's squarer than a table.

String.Source: Yes, but I won't be groping her chin. I'm more interested in the parts that are common to all women.
String.Dest: Yes, but I won't be groping her chin. I'm more interested in the parts that are common to all women.

String.Source: Are you a friend of Haelga's?
String.Dest: 你是哈尔嘉的朋友？

String.Source: I'm not a friend, I'm a suitor. If only I could convince her to see me as such.
String.Dest: I'm not a friend, I'm a suitor. If only I could convince her to see me as such.

String.Source: No, you're quite right. Her bosom is very ample.
String.Dest: No, you're quite right. Her bosom is very ample.

String.Source: Although granted, it's not all about her bosom, although that does weigh heavily into my decision to pursue her.
String.Dest: 虽然我承认，这不都是因为她的巨乳。虽然那确实是最重要的决定因素让我去追求她。

String.Source: None taken.
String.Dest: 一个都没说对。

String.Source: Yes, it's not like I don't have friends that are Argonian. Real ones. Not the imaginary kind people make up to hide their prejudice.
String.Dest: Yes, it's not like I don't have friends that are Argonian. Real ones. Not the imaginary kind people make up to hide their prejudice.

String.Source: None taken.
String.Dest: 一个都没说对。

String.Source: I can even tell you their names! Wujeeta's a kind soul and a good fisherman, at least when she isn't offering favors for skooma.
String.Dest: 我甚至可以告诉你他们的名字！巫杰塔是一个善良的渔夫，至少在她吸食斯库玛之前。

String.Source: None taken.
String.Dest: 一个都没说对。

String.Source: Keerava and Talen-Jei are the personification of true love. Something we all aspire to achieve.
String.Dest: 基拉瓦和塔伦杰就像是真爱的化身，我们所有都渴望得到这些东西。

String.Source: You'll have to get in line. I think it ends somewhere in Black Marsh.
String.Dest: You'll have to get in line. I think it ends somewhere in Black Marsh.

String.Source: And follow a bunch of Argonians? Talk about your sloppy seconds. No offense.
String.Dest: And follow a bunch of Argonians? Talk about your sloppy seconds. No offense.

String.Source: Fear not. I have no desire to kill you. I might lop off a hand though.
String.Dest: Fear not. I have no desire to kill you. I might lop off a hand though.

String.Source: I hope not! I've grown quite attached to it. We're practically inseparable.
String.Dest: I hope not! I've grown quite attached to it. We're practically inseparable.

String.Source: That shouldn't be too difficult, if you don't mind sharing.
String.Dest: 如果你不介意分享的话，这事就不会太困难。

String.Source: Oh I don't mind. I'm not in it for the long haul. All I want is to bed a woman with as little effort as possible.
String.Dest: Oh I don't mind. I'm not in it for the long haul. All I want is to bed a woman with as little effort as possible.

String.Source: That shouldn't be too difficult, if you don't mind sharing.
String.Dest: 如果你不介意分享的话，这事就不会太困难。

String.Source: Especially one with such an ample bosom. I think that's the right word. Ample.
String.Dest: Especially one with such an ample bosom. I think that's the right word. Ample.

String.Source: What do you ultimately want with Haelga? Romance? Marriage?
String.Dest: What do you ultimately want with Haelga? Romance? Marriage?

String.Source: Marry Haelga? Now there's a frightening thought. Oh no, I assure you, my intentions are entirely puerile. I want to bed her.
String.Dest: Marry Haelga? Now there's a frightening thought. Oh no, I assure you, my intentions are entirely puerile. I want to bed her.

String.Source: What do you ultimately want with Haelga? Romance? Marriage?
String.Dest: What do you ultimately want with Haelga? Romance? Marriage?

String.Source: I want to dip my face in her ample, ample bosom and make crude animal noises.
String.Dest: I want to dip my face in her ample, ample bosom and make crude animal noises.

String.Source: What do you ultimately want with Haelga? Romance? Marriage?
String.Dest: What do you ultimately want with Haelga? Romance? Marriage?

String.Source: I want to taste her apple pie, eat her sweet roll, and...now I'm hungry.
String.Dest: 我想尝她的苹果派，吃她的甜甜圈，然后…然后我饿了。

String.Source: Leave her be. A thoughtful guy like you deserves better.
String.Dest: 离开她吧。想你这样的人应该值得更好的。

String.Source: And what if "better" deserves more than what I am? No, if I cannot woo a debauched woman like Haelga, I might as well marry a Draugr.
String.Dest: 要是那个“更好的”值得比我更好的人呢？不，如果我无法对哈尔嘉这种荡妇求爱，我干脆娶尸鬼为妻算了。

String.Source: I don't know what I'm doing wrong. Why won't Haelga acknowledge me?
String.Dest: I don't know what I'm doing wrong. Why won't Haelga acknowledge me?

String.Source: Really? I just lost my appetite.
String.Dest: Really? I just lost my appetite.

String.Source: Did I mention her bosom was ample? It seemed like an important detail.
String.Dest: Did I mention her bosom was ample? It seemed like an important detail.

String.Source: How's that working out for you?
String.Dest: 你做得如何啦？

String.Source: Not well. No matter how ferociously I chase Haelga, she treats me as if I just contracted Swamp Fever.
String.Dest: Not well. No matter how ferociously I chase Haelga, she treats me as if I just contracted Swamp Fever.

String.Source: How's that working out for you?
String.Dest: 你做得如何啦？

String.Source: Does she think I'm an Argonian! I've never even seen a swamp! Um, no offense.
String.Dest: Does she think I'm an Argonian! I've never even seen a swamp! Um, no offense.

String.Source: And here I thought your motives were noble. You're just another deviant.
String.Dest: 我想你的动机是高尚的。你只是离经叛道。

String.Source: Not entirely. There are two heads at play here. One sees this as training. No different than becoming a bard or mastering the sword.
String.Dest: Not entirely. There are two heads at play here. One sees this as training. No different than becoming a bard or mastering the sword.

String.Source: And here I thought your motives were noble. You're just another deviant.
String.Dest: 我想你的动机是高尚的。你只是离经叛道。

String.Source: The other's goal is fairly self-explanatory. But if you like I can explain it for you, with pictures and shadow puppets.
String.Dest: The other's goal is fairly self-explanatory. But if you like I can explain it for you, with pictures and shadow puppets.

String.Source: That's not funny.
String.Dest: 这可不好笑。

String.Source: Oh, rats. You're gonna beat me up now, aren't you. Well, I'll have you know I am well trained in the art of curling up in a ball and weeping softly.
String.Dest: Oh, rats. You're gonna beat me up now, aren't you. Well, I'll have you know I am well trained in the art of curling up in a ball and weeping softly.

String.Source: Is that why this place smells so bad?
String.Dest: Is that why this place smells so bad?

String.Source: They say that the best way to answer life's biggest questions is to look inward. This is no different.
String.Dest: They say that the best way to answer life's biggest questions is to look inward. This is no different.

String.Source: Ever consider that your habits are why Haelga deflects your advances?
String.Dest: 你就没有想过其实正是你的习惯才使得哈尔嘉不愿意接受你的好意？

String.Source: Well, that was sarcasm. Trust me, my skin may be colored like a mudcrab, but I've taken care not to smell like one.
String.Dest: 这个嘛……挺讽刺的。相信我，也许我的肤色很像泥沼蟹，但我已经努力让它别闻起来也像。

String.Source: I apologize for my rudeness. I was simply curious.
String.Dest: I apologize for my rudeness. I was simply curious.

String.Source: Yes, I understand. Curiosity is the driving force in many of our lives, and the failure to sate it can lead to many a frustration.
String.Dest: Yes, I understand. Curiosity is the driving force in many of our lives, and the failure to sate it can lead to many a frustration.

String.Source: I apologize for my rudeness. I was simply curious.
String.Dest: I apologize for my rudeness. I was simply curious.

String.Source: Sometimes I think it's best to just sit down and read about other people's adventures instead.
String.Dest: Sometimes I think it's best to just sit down and read about other people's adventures instead.

String.Source: I apologize for my rudeness. I was simply curious.
String.Dest: I apologize for my rudeness. I was simply curious.

String.Source: What about you? Do you enjoy the art of reading?
String.Dest: What about you? Do you enjoy the art of reading?

String.Source: Who are you? What is it you do here?
String.Dest: Who are you? What is it you do here?

String.Source: Now that's an odd and brusque way to address a stranger now, isn't it?
String.Dest: 这样的方式跟陌生人说话很奇怪也很冒失，对吧？

String.Source: I like to read the fear in a man's eyes as I bludgeon him.
String.Dest: 我喜欢在棒击别人时品味他眼中的恐惧。

String.Source: Ah, then we have much in common. Me being the person who is usually bludgeoned. Not much else though.
String.Dest: Ah, then we have much in common. Me being the person who is usually bludgeoned. Not much else though.

String.Source: Have you tried other women? What of the Temple of Dibella?
String.Dest: Have you tried other women? What of the Temple of Dibella?

String.Source: I know. I saved up all my gold, traveled to the opposite end of Skyrim and what did they tell me?
String.Dest: I know. I saved up all my gold, traveled to the opposite end of Skyrim and what did they tell me?

String.Source: Have you tried other women? What of the Temple of Dibella?
String.Dest: Have you tried other women? What of the Temple of Dibella?

String.Source: Have you tried other women? What of the Temple of Dibella?
String.Dest: Have you tried other women? What of the Temple of Dibella?

String.Source: Oh no, I'm not going through that again. Haelga is right here, and by all accounts not a picky woman.
String.Dest: Oh no, I'm not going through that again. Haelga is right here, and by all accounts not a picky woman.

String.Source: Is it possible Haelga isn't as promiscuous as you think?
String.Dest: Is it possible Haelga isn't as promiscuous as you think?

String.Source: What makes you think bedding Haelga will be that easy?
String.Dest: What makes you think bedding Haelga will be that easy?

String.Source: It's well known that Haelga is what ruffians call a very "loose" woman.
String.Dest: It's well known that Haelga is what ruffians call a very "loose" woman.

String.Source: Is it possible Haelga isn't as promiscuous as you think?
String.Dest: Is it possible Haelga isn't as promiscuous as you think?

String.Source: What makes you think bedding Haelga will be that easy?
String.Dest: What makes you think bedding Haelga will be that easy?

String.Source: Man, Mer, Dwarven Centurion, they say she takes all who are willing.
String.Dest: 人类、精灵、矮人百夫长，据说不管谁想要她都愿意。

String.Source: Is it possible Haelga isn't as promiscuous as you think?
String.Dest: Is it possible Haelga isn't as promiscuous as you think?

String.Source: What makes you think bedding Haelga will be that easy?
String.Dest: What makes you think bedding Haelga will be that easy?

String.Source: Somehow I manage to be excluded from this special fraternity.
String.Dest: 不知何故，我被这个特殊的组织拒于门外。

String.Source: Is it possible Haelga isn't as promiscuous as you think?
String.Dest: Is it possible Haelga isn't as promiscuous as you think?

String.Source: Ah yes, you speak of the difference between perception and reality.
String.Dest: 啊，你提到了理想与现实的差距。

String.Source: Is it possible Haelga isn't as promiscuous as you think?
String.Dest: Is it possible Haelga isn't as promiscuous as you think?

String.Source: I've read enough phony bard tales to know how stories like to wash heroes clean while the villains are run through the mud.
String.Dest: 读过这么多唬烂人的吟游诗人故事，足以让我明白故事如何漂白英雄，而恶棍沾了满身烂泥。

String.Source: Is it possible Haelga isn't as promiscuous as you think?
String.Dest: Is it possible Haelga isn't as promiscuous as you think?

String.Source: So maybe you're right. But blaming others for your failings seems rather daft.
String.Dest: So maybe you're right. But blaming others for your failings seems rather daft.

String.Source: Then what's stopping you? Go for it.
String.Dest: Then what's stopping you? Go for it.

String.Source: Oh you jest, but bedding a woman is not so simple as you make it sound. I should know, I'm terrible at it.
String.Dest: Oh you jest, but bedding a woman is not so simple as you make it sound. I should know, I'm terrible at it.

String.Source: My favorite books are about Argonian maids and their varying degrees of lust.
String.Dest: 我最喜欢的书事关于蜥蜴人女佣的情欲故事。

String.Source: Then you've come to the right place!
String.Dest: 那你真是来对地方了！

String.Source: My favorite books are about Argonian maids and their varying degrees of lust.
String.Dest: 我最喜欢的书事关于蜥蜴人女佣的情欲故事。

String.Source: Wujeeta will knead your loaf for a drop of skooma, and you could probably slip a maid outfit on From-Deepest-Fathoms without her ever noticing.
String.Dest: 巫杰塔会为了一滴斯库玛搓爆你的脑袋，而你则可以把她的女仆装塞进她的乳沟还不会被她发现。

String.Source: My favorite books are about Argonian maids and their varying degrees of lust.
String.Dest: 我最喜欢的书事关于蜥蜴人女佣的情欲故事。

String.Source: In Riften, everyone's spear gets polished! Please don't tell Keerava I said that.
String.Dest: 在裂谷城，每个人的矛都被磨得发亮！请别告诉基拉瓦这是我说的。

String.Source: Some people write about confronting the Wolf Queen. I live it.
String.Dest: Some people write about confronting the Wolf Queen. I live it.

String.Source: In that case, I envy you. A book's greatest strength and weakness is its ability to distort reality. I'm curious as to how big the effect is.
String.Dest: In that case, I envy you. A book's greatest strength and weakness is its ability to distort reality. I'm curious as to how big the effect is.

String.Source: Relax. I don't want to soil my fists pummeling such a filthy worm.
String.Dest: Relax. I don't want to soil my fists pummeling such a filthy worm.

String.Source: Then thank the Divines I neglected to bathe.
String.Dest: Then thank the Divines I neglected to bathe.

String.Source: Works on everyone else.
String.Dest: 为其他人工作。

String.Source: That I believe. I will never understand the etiquette here. Everything is about saving time and how short life is.
String.Dest: That I believe. I will never understand the etiquette here. Everything is about saving time and how short life is.

String.Source: Works on everyone else.
String.Dest: 为其他人工作。

String.Source: No one ever stops to sit down and read a good book. Or a bad book, for that matter. The Divines know there are plenty of those.
String.Dest: No one ever stops to sit down and read a good book. Or a bad book, for that matter. The Divines know there are plenty of those.

String.Source: Works on everyone else.
String.Dest: 为其他人工作。

String.Source: What about you? Do you enjoy the art of reading?
String.Dest: What about you? Do you enjoy the art of reading?

String.Source: If you have any tips on how to woo Haelga, let me know.
String.Dest: If you have any tips on how to woo Haelga, let me know.

String.Source: Safe travels.
String.Dest: 旅途安全。

String.Source: All right then.
String.Dest: 那好吧。

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: What can I do for you?
String.Dest: 有什么可以效劳的？

String.Source: If you want my opinion on Black-Briar Mead, I have nothing bad to say. I'd rather not go to bed missing a toe.
String.Dest: If you want my opinion on Black-Briar Mead, I have nothing bad to say. I'd rather not go to bed missing a toe.

String.Source: You should try the fish here. Nothing like a good book and good mead to warm the heart.
String.Dest: You should try the fish here. Nothing like a good book and good mead to warm the heart.

String.Source: I asked Haelga's niece for a refill, but I think she forgot. Tythis was harassing her again last night. Poor thing.
String.Dest: I asked Haelga's niece for a refill, but I think she forgot. Tythis was harassing her again last night. Poor thing.

String.Source: By the way, I was wondering if you caught a glimpse of that statue of Dibella. Notice its shape. You don't think...No, it couldn't possibly fit.
String.Dest: By the way, I was wondering if you caught a glimpse of that statue of Dibella. Notice its shape. You don't think...No, it couldn't possibly fit.

String.Source: The mead here is cold and dry. Just like Haelga.
String.Dest: The mead here is cold and dry. Just like Haelga.

String.Source: How much do you want for them?
String.Dest: How much do you want for them?

String.Source: Nothing. They didn't cost me anything to read them, so why should it cost you. Hopefully they'll help you fill some of those empty hours.
String.Dest: Nothing. They didn't cost me anything to read them, so why should it cost you. Hopefully they'll help you fill some of those empty hours.

String.Source: Do you mind if I take a look at them?
String.Dest: Do you mind if I take a look at them?

String.Source: You can have them, actually. Hopefully they'll help you fill some of those empty hours.
String.Dest: You can have them, actually. Hopefully they'll help you fill some of those empty hours.

String.Source: No, I don't know. What else could you possibly be talking about?
String.Dest: No, I don't know. What else could you possibly be talking about?

String.Source: Well, I'm actually talking about two things, and they're both attached to Haelga's chest. Which would make my love of books a distant third.
String.Dest: Well, I'm actually talking about two things, and they're both attached to Haelga's chest. Which would make my love of books a distant third.

String.Source: Yes, we all know about your infatuation with the bunkhouse woman.
String.Dest: Yes, we all know about your infatuation with the bunkhouse woman.

String.Source: She has a name you know. Although I suppose that's not really important to either of us.
String.Dest: She has a name you know. Although I suppose that's not really important to either of us.

String.Source: I'm not interested in discussing your other hobbies, sorry.
String.Dest: I'm not interested in discussing your other hobbies, sorry.

String.Source: Understood. We'll keep this conversation completely focused on bosoms, I mean, books, no, sorry, what I'm trying to say is...breasts.
String.Dest: Understood. We'll keep this conversation completely focused on bosoms, I mean, books, no, sorry, what I'm trying to say is...breasts.

String.Source: I'm not interested in discussing your other hobbies, sorry.
String.Dest: I'm not interested in discussing your other hobbies, sorry.

String.Source: At least if we're talking about the erotic brand of literature.
String.Dest: At least if we're talking about the erotic brand of literature.

String.Source: Stalking, from what I understand.
String.Dest: Stalking, from what I understand.

String.Source: Is that what I'm doing? Well, it does sound rather malevolent when you put it that way.
String.Dest: Is that what I'm doing? Well, it does sound rather malevolent when you put it that way.

String.Source: I want to ask you about some books.
String.Dest: I want to ask you about some books.

String.Source: Oh? Books are my favorite subject. Well, other than, you know...
String.Dest: Oh? Books are my favorite subject. Well, other than, you know...

String.Source: I want to ask you about some books.
String.Dest: I want to ask you about some books.

String.Source: What can you tell me about the person who sent you these books?
String.Dest: What can you tell me about the person who sent you these books?

String.Source: Not much. I received them from a courier not too long ago, with specific instructions to hold on to said books until the owner retrieved them.
String.Dest: Not much. I received them from a courier not too long ago, with specific instructions to hold on to said books until the owner retrieved them.

String.Source: I want to ask you about some books.
String.Dest: I want to ask you about some books.

String.Source: What can you tell me about the person who sent you these books?
String.Dest: What can you tell me about the person who sent you these books?

String.Source: But he said if he didn't show up within a week, I was free to do with them as I pleased.
String.Dest: But he said if he didn't show up within a week, I was free to do with them as I pleased.

String.Source: I want to ask you about some books.
String.Dest: I want to ask you about some books.

String.Source: What can you tell me about the person who sent you these books?
String.Dest: What can you tell me about the person who sent you these books?

String.Source: The whole thing was rather bizarre, but these days what isn't.
String.Dest: The whole thing was rather bizarre, but these days what isn't.

String.Source: I want to ask you about some books.
String.Dest: I want to ask you about some books.

String.Source: Did you receive a gift of books from a friend recently?
String.Dest: Did you receive a gift of books from a friend recently?

String.Source: Why yes. Three of them in fact. I'm not entirely sure from why, or even who sent them.
String.Dest: Why yes. Three of them in fact. I'm not entirely sure from why, or even who sent them.

String.Source: I want to ask you about some books.
String.Dest: I want to ask you about some books.

String.Source: Did you receive a gift of books from a friend recently?
String.Dest: Did you receive a gift of books from a friend recently?

String.Source: But perhaps it was someone who knew of my fondness for literature.
String.Dest: But perhaps it was someone who knew of my fondness for literature.

String.Source: Well, we all know Niluva's addicted to skooma. What if you were to place a bottle in your trousers and...
String.Dest: 嗯，我们都知道尼路佤磕斯库玛上瘾了。如果你把一瓶斯库玛搁进裤子里，然后...

String.Source: What? Don't look at me like that, I'm being serious.
String.Dest: 啊？别用那种眼神看我，我是认真的！

String.Source: Will you shut up and just hear me out for a second?
String.Dest: 你就不能闭上嘴听我说两句吗？

String.Source: Listen to me Peragorn, you'll never get Niluva's attention the way you're going about it.
String.Dest: 听着佩勒根，用这种方法的话，你永远也得不到尼路佤的关注。

String.Source: Hmm...maybe you're right. I'll take fifty.
String.Dest: Hmm...maybe you're right. I'll take fifty.

String.Source: Oh no Yushari, I'm not falling for that again. I've been giving Haelga mountain flowers every day and every day I find them in the waste bucket.
String.Dest: Oh no Yushari, I'm not falling for that again. I've been giving Haelga mountain flowers every day and every day I find them in the waste bucket.

String.Source: Ha! What do you know about clothes?
String.Dest: Ha! What do you know about clothes?

String.Source: Well, that's disappointing. Now where am I going to go to get new clothes?
String.Dest: Well, that's disappointing. Now where am I going to go to get new clothes?

String.Source: No! Really?
String.Dest: No! Really?

String.Source: Yushari, why is the tailor not around?
String.Dest: Yushari, why is the tailor not around?

String.Source: But either way, I hope it finds a use for it. And thanks again. I almost forgot what it felt like. Kindness.
String.Dest: But either way, I hope it finds a use for it. And thanks again. I almost forgot what it felt like. Kindness.
